name: ExPro
short_description:
We originally wanted the project named "ExProject", but the name has been used.
The project proposed by "the.HiCZB" Welcome everyone to participate.
Our aim is to make our application in GNU / Linux, MS Windows and OS / X on a consistent user experience (and not just look the same).
This is similar to the Java Virtual Machine, but specifically for local application (rather than in a Web application).
We need to simulate the assembly language level, for higher scalability (Instead in order to get higher performance).
summary: A cross-platform virtual machine project, named ExPro
